document_data.mainbody: 'Azak Throm''' ({{Pronounce|AZ|ack|_|THROHM|refs={{Cite adventurers league/Flames of Kythorn|29}}}}) was a [[Red Wizard of Thay]] diplomat in [[Mulmaster]] in [[1491 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Azak was a cunning and calculating individual. He had an immense ego but was tempered by incredible patience.
document_data.History:
Azak worked at the [[Thay]]an embassy in Mulmaster as a diplomat. In truth, he was a spy of [[Szass Tam]], which was suspected by the [[Hawks]], Mulmaster's secret police, who always surveilled him.

In 1491 DR, he happened to be involved in a mysterious arson attack on [[Tiega Gos]], whilst meeting with her nephew, the mad painter [[Andrik Gos]]. An adventuring party hired to unveil the truth interrogated him.
